Classic twitchy team coordination shooter without mobility enhancement. The economy meta can be very interesting once you fully understand it, but newbies should expect to get demolished pretty consistently. Competitive gamemode is the real experience, and casual should only be thought of as practice. Expect one of the most toxic communities in gaming.

Easily the best balanced shooter I've ever played. I originally got it in 2016 to play surf and barely touched it, but over quarantine, I played a bunch with my friends and fell in love with it. I played 250 hours of Siege before this and some Valorant after playing this, but I never liked either as much as I like this game.
um jogo muito bom, otimo para fazer amizade, e para passar o tempo
If I could choose between playing this game and getting hit by a cow at full speed. I would choose love.
I have nothing to say because it's just the best shooter, it's simple and everything is depending on your skill and not how many hours you played or how much money you spend.
